title: Ross.Kemp.in.Afghanistan.Part1-5.720p.HDTV.x264-SFM
description:
Ross Kemp and his BAFTA-winning documentary team experience life on the front line, providing an unprecedented insight into the heat of a war zone inthis landmark five-part documentary.  In the first episode, Ross prepares for deployment and  joins up with 1 Royal Anglian as they train during a cold British winter on Salisbury Plain. They\&#039;retraining for what they will face in Afghanistan, which includes convoy protection and deploying from Chinook helicopters. During one exercise, Ross\&#039; group is attacked and Ross and several others are told that theyhave been \&#039;killed\&#039; by the enemy. It\&#039;s a sobering thought. Three months later Ross will be playing this scenario for real.
